tool_description: Decomposes time series data into trend, seasonal, and residual components to understand underlying patterns and improve forecasting accuracy.

timestamps.description: Timestamps corresponding to time series values

decomposition_type.description: Type of decomposition: additive or multiplicative

seasonal_period.description: Expected seasonal period length (e.g., 24 for daily, 168 for weekly)

error_messages: Data length mismatch: Time series and timestamps must have equal length.
Insufficient data: At least 24 data points required for decomposition analysis.
Invalid decomposition type: Use either 'additive' or 'multiplicative'.
Invalid seasonal period: Seasonal period must be positive and less than half the data length.
Data quality insufficient: Time series contains too many missing or invalid values for decomposition.
usage: Input time series data with corresponding timestamps. Choose decomposition type based on whether seasonal effects are constant (additive) or proportional (multiplicative). Specify seasonal period if known.

trend_component.description: Long-term trend component of the time series
